page.title: 02Eden Park Area
page.content: This square's major land cover is 48% housing secondary land cover is 33% rough grazing.There is the preserved Torbay and South Devon Railway running through the square,this goes from Paignton to Kingswear,they run preserved steam engines of the G.W.R. One of the main stations Churston has the lines turntable and sidings where they stable their rolling stock. There is a viaduct 150 years old this year carrying the railway over Broadsands housing estate. The local Churston Grammar school is also in this square ,Churston golf club has their club house and the 1st tee near the station and Grammar school.The bus routes going through this square connect Brixham, Galmpton, and Kingswear.
